channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Matt Willis: Fighting Addiction
channel.desc: Musician, actor and dad of three, Matt Willis, may seem to have it all. He's part of the hugely successful noughties pop band, Busted, has a flourishing acting career and is happily married to TV presenter Emma Willis, with whom he has three kids. But behind the success, there is one thing that often dominates his thoughts: his addictions.
